review: I wasted good money on this. I cannot watch Netflix movies with it. Every time I try it says "IDCP unauthorized. Content disabled." But I can hear the movie! When I first got it I could watch Netflix. Now I can't. Very disappointed Cannot watch Sho anytime either because Comcast will not authorize. All the Amazon Prime movies I can watch on my laptop, now I must pay to watch with the Fire TV Stick even though I'm signed into Amazon Prime and my watch list even come up on the TV screen. It worked for one day...now nothing but lame old indieflix. WOW do not waste ur money.
